name: Telegram Encoder Bot
description: A powerful video encoding bot using Python, Celery, FFmpeg, and MongoDB.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot API token from @BotFather.

BRANDING_WEBSITE.description: The default website or channel link for metadata.
